mapper.select: Select informatation_inf.informatation_id , informatation_inf.informatation_tittle , informatation_inf.informatation_text , informatation_inf.informatation_time , informatation_inf.exam_id ,informatation_inf.user_id FROM informatation_inf ORDER BY informatation_time DESC LIMIT #{page},18 ;
SELECT exam_name FROM exam_inf WHERE exam_id=#{id};
SELECT user_name FROM user_inf WHERE user_id=#{id};

select e.exam_id, e.exam_name, e.start_time, e.end_time, e.reg_end_time, p.project_name from exam_inf AS e join paper_inf AS pi on e.paper_id = pi.paper_id join project_inf AS p on pi.project_id = p.project_id where e.reg_end_time > current_timestamp order by e.exam_time desc;
SELECT reg_id FROM reg_inf WHERE stu_id=#{stuId} AND exam_id=#{examId} AND pass_state >=0;

select e.exam_id, e.exam_name, e.start_time, e.end_time, e.reg_end_time, p.project_name from reg_inf AS r join exam_inf AS e on r.exam_id = e.exam_id join paper_inf AS pi on e.paper_id = pi.paper_id join project_inf AS p on pi.project_id = p.project_id where e.start_time > current_timestamp AND r.stu_id=#{stuId} order by e.exam_time desc;
